function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Challenges in secure tracking of learning process and verifying student credentials leading to potential data security threats","Impact":"Compromised student data, online content, and student performance evaluation","Mitigation":"Implement secure blockchain-based platforms for cross-platform sharing of online content and secure storage of student data","Technologies":"Blockchain-based platforms for secure data sharing and storage","People":"Students, teachers, educational institutions","Owner":"Educational institutions, technology providers"},{"Description":"Impact on world economy and businesses due to lockdowns and social distancing, with the challenge of time-consuming paper-based loan processes","Impact":"Delayed economic recovery, business closures, financial instability","Mitigation":"Adopt blockchain with smart contracts for simplified loan and insurance application and approval processes","Technologies":"Blockchain with smart contracts for streamlined financial services","People":"Governments, financial organizations, businesses","Owner":"Governments, financial organizations"},{"Description":"Necessity for continuous and automated surveillance to monitor COVID-19 symptoms and transmission rates","Impact":"Inadequate surveillance leading to increased spread of COVID-19 and risk to human lives","Mitigation":"Implement continuous and automated surveillance systems for alerting and monitoring COVID-19 symptoms","Technologies":"Blockchain-powered UAVs and robots for automated surveillance and contactless delivery","People":"General public, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology providers"}]}
